# AlarmPresentationState.Mode.paused(_:)

**Case**

A mode indicating the alarm isn’t active.

## Declaration

```swift
case paused(AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Paused)
```

## Discussion

An alarm can only be in one of these states at a time.

## Pausing an alarm

- **AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Paused**: An object that specifies the current state of the alarm is paused.
